alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gallatin; Grant; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHERN RIPLEY, SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN, SWITZERLAND, CARROLL, NORTHWESTERN GRANT, NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bedford, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Vevay, Warsaw, Dillsboro, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Pleasant, Glencoe, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Patriot, Worthville, Prestonville, Aberdeen, Rexville, Cold Springs, Wheatley and Steele Bottom. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
